name: Shopping Spree (Sl1ngShot)
description:
Grab EVERYTHING that's not bolted to the floor and get out in less than 20 seconds in this frantic first person 3D shopping spree simulator. This game was made for the 20 Seconds Game Jam.

Controls

Like your run-of-the-mill first person game.

  • Press E or Left Click to grab the highlighted object
  • While holding an object press E or Left Click to drop or Right Click to throw

Credits

Music by: Bensound.com/free-music-for-videos

Font by: ctrlcctrlv

3D assets by: Synty Studios
